resources.string: {\"title\": \"First Linear Quiz\", \"type\": \"linear quiz\", \"questions\": [{\"query\": \"What is the answer to 1+1?\", \"answers\": [{\"answer\": 2, \"score\": 1}, {\"answer\": 3, \"score\": 0}, {\"answer\": 4, \"score\": 0}, {\"answer\": 5, \"score\": 0}]}, {\"query\": \"What is the answer to 2+2?\", \"answers\": [{\"answer\": 2, \"score\": 0}, {\"answer\": 3, \"score\": 0}, {\"answer\": 4, \"score\": 1}, {\"answer\": 5, \"score\": 1}]}]}

{\"title\": \"First Linear Quiz\", \"type\": \"linear quiz\", \"questions\": [{\"query\": \"What is the answer to 1+1?\", \"answers\": [{\"answer\": 2, \"score\": 1}, {\"answer\": 3, \"score\": 0}, {\"answer\": 4, \"score\": 0}, {\"answer\": 5, \"score\": 0}]}, {\"query\": \"What is the answer to 2+2?\", \"answers\": [{\"answer\": 2, \"score\": 0}, {\"answer\": 3, \"score\": 0}, {\"answer\": 4, \"score\": 1}, {\"answer\": 5, \"score\": 0}]}, {\"query\": \"How spicy is spicy?\", \"answers\": [{\"answer\": \"very spicy\", \"score\": 0}, {\"answer\": \"somewhat spicy\", \"score\": 1}, {\"answer\": \"little spicy\", \"score\": 0}, {\"answer\": \"not spicy at all\", \"score\": 0}]}]}

{\"title\": \"First Personality Quiz\", \"type\": \"personality quiz\", \"questions\": [{\"query\": \"What is your favorite color?\", \"answers\": [{\"answer\": \"blue\", \"score\": [0, 0, -1, 1]}, {\"answer\": \"red\", \"score\": [0, 0, 1, -1]}, {\"answer\": \"yellow\", \"score\": [0, 1, 0, 1]}, {\"answer\": \"green\", \"score\": [0, 1, -1, 1]}]}, {\"query\": \"What is your favorite drink?\", \"answers\": [{\"answer\": \"Coke\", \"score\": [-1, -1, -1, 1]}, {\"answer\": \"Water\", \"score\": [-1, 1, 1, -1]}, {\"answer\": \"Orange Juice\", \"score\": [1, 1, -1, 0]}, {\"answer\": \"Tap Water\", \"score\": [0, 0, -1, 1]}]}, {\"query\": \"What is your favorite fruit?\", \"answers\": [{\"answer\": \"Orange\", \"score\": [0, 1, 1, -1]}, {\"answer\": \"Apple\", \"score\": [0, 0, -1, -1]}, {\"answer\": \"Banana\", \"score\": [-1, -1, 1, 1]}, {\"answer\": \"Watermelon\", \"score\": [1, 1, -1, 1]}]}], \"interpretation\": [[\"Mad\", \"Not Mad\"], [\"Smart\", \"Not Smart\"], [\"Fun\", \"Not Fun\"], [\"Lazy\", \"Not Lazy\"]]}
